name: Iris to Id: Ghosts in the Machine
storyline:
◆

Good Morning to a wonderful day.
Good Evening to the night of possibilities.
Good Night to our memories of yesteryear.
Good morning, good evening and good night.
I pray for the days this peace will last.
Good Morning, Good Evening and Good Night.
May we become everlasting friends.

◆

You are invited into the fragmented tale of four unconventional friends, bound together by a series of increasingly sinister events.

Will these friends be able to uncover its secrets before it’s too late? Or will they succumb to the ghosts haunting them of their pasts?

Iris to Id: Ghost In The Machine is an atmospheric visual novel where you can immerse yourself in these characters’ lives, their struggles, and see if they can overcome the sins looming over them.
summary: A tale of four unconventional friends bound together by a series of increasingly sinister events.
